original_text: So Hezekiah gave him all the silver that was found in the temple of the Lord and in the treasuries of the royal palace.
korean_text: 히스기야가 이에 여호와의 성전과 왕궁 곳간에 있는 은을 다 주었고

sentences.original_text: So Hezekiah gave him all the silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 히스기야는 그에게 모든 은을 주었으니

sentences.original_text: that was found in the temple of the Lord
and in the treasuries of the royal palace
